scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output index.android.bundle
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/
